casebody.data:
FIE, LLC
v.
NEW JAX CONDO ASSOCIATION, INC. and Earl Weber FIE, LLC
v.
New Jax Condo Association, Inc. and Earl Weber No. 2018-C-446 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 25, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FOURTH CIRCUIT, PARISH OF ORLEANS Writ denied. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons: I would grant and docket this writ application to examine the res nova issue of whether loss of use damages may be awarded to a juridical person, the importance of which is heightened here by the substantial judgment awarded to plaintiff.
